name: Burning Feathers (Spacesoda Games)
description:
This week has been very busy for each of us. However, in the limited time, we still want to produce a game in this game jam. it might not be fully finished, but after the voting ends we will continue this project. 

----

The game revolves around a  weakened phoenix called upon to defend a kingdom from the shadow beasts, using its fiery powers to battle against the shadowy creatures and drive them back into the darkness.

Play Time: 1 - 5 minutes.

Controls:

WASD/arrow keys to move.

Spacebar for shooting fire.

Burning Feathers is a game under the name of Spacesoda Games, an Independent collaboration studio. Burning Feathers collaborators are Adib Wahono (Adene), Alya Anggasari (layalay), and Rafico Lingga 

Found us on:

Spacesoda Games - Instagram/Discord

Acknowledgements:

As this has been our second game jam and managing time while we're also busy with work is very challenging. As far as one busy week goes this is all we can do for now. However, with your critiques and suggestions, we hope to improve the game after the game jam votings end. Thank you very much for playing our games.
